Text: Styria (Slovene: "Štajerska" ), also Slovenian Styria ("Slovenska Štajerska") or Lower Styria ("Spodnja Štajerska"; German: "Untersteiermark" ), is a traditional region in northeastern Slovenia, comprising the southern third of the former Duchy of Styria.

Text: Styria (Slovenia):  The largest city is Maribor.
